iti27:2.1: “Yani kanici, bhikkhave, opadhikani punnakiriyavatthuni sabbani tani mettaya cetovimuttiya kalam nagghanti solasim.
iti27:2.2: Mettayeva tani cetovimutti adhiggahetva bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
iti27:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ya kaci tarakarupanam pabha sabba ta candiya pabhaya kalam nagghanti solasim, candapabhayeva ta adhiggahetva bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
iti27:3.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici opadhikani punnakiriyavatthuni sabbani tani mettaya cetovimuttiya kalam nagghanti solasim, mettayeva tani cetovimutti adhiggahetva bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
iti27:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, vassanam pacchime mase saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve adicco nabham abbhussakkamano sabbam akasagatam tamagatam abhivihacca bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
iti27:4.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici opadhikani punnakiriyavatthuni sabbani tani mettaya cetovimuttiya kalam nagghanti solasim, mettayeva tani cetovimutti adhiggahetva bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
iti27:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rattiya paccusasamayam osadhitaraka bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca;
iti27:5.2: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yani kanici opadhikani punnakiriyavatthuni sabbani tani mettaya cetovimuttiya kalam nagghanti solasim, mettayeva tani cetovimutti adhiggahetva bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca”ti.
iti27:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
